summary:
Good knowledge of SAP Fiori and implementation of custom Fiori Applications. Possess Strong Knowledge in OData Service (Modelling, Programming, Debugging). Develop Fiori applications consuming the SAP NetWeaver Gateway Service by using web technologies like SAPUI5,HTML5,JavaScript.Deep hands-on experience with SAP Web IDE to enhance standard FIORI applications and developing FIORI applications from scratch.Created an SAPUI5 applciation to fetch data from Jira System and to display it SAPUI5 application using Smart Table.

Highly experienced SAP ABAP and POL technical lead consultant with over 19 years of high end consulting experience in enterprise financial applications. I also have BPM knowledge to orchestrate services in POL.

I have expert knowledge in the SAP solution portfolio for banking industry and have experience in implementing cutting edge products from SAP such as POL and BPM to design interface objects. 

I am proficient in design, configuration, generation and Editing UI wizards of POL/POB, specifically for banking clients. I have executed process orchestration using POL in and end to end SAP loans, collateral and deposit management implementation for a Dutch Co-operative Bank.

I have developed synchronous and asynchronous custom services using SIW tool of POL that supports PPO process. 

I am currently  working as BPM,POL and ABAP consultant for banking services and FICAx system. My role includes designing and building solution for services and implementing in POL and SAP. I also guide a team of technical consultants on SAP POL and ABAP development approaches, standard and guidelines.

I exhibit good understanding of customer business process needs through extensive experience in playing key roles across 9 end to end implementation covering FICO, MM, PS, SD, PP, HR, SRM,BI, POL modules  for  various industry sectors.

I have good communicating and management skills with a very strong analytical, problem solving and decision making capacity. I have excellent trouble shooting and very strong debugging skills.

In my role as technical lead i have the ability to liaison with various internal and external stake holders to conceptualize, design and deliver big transformation projects.

profile_positions.description:
Design and develop interfaces for SAP loans management and Ficax systems using Process Object layer which is the new tool of SAP for Banking services.
Development of big compound service using POL, createfinancialdossier, which consists of multiple business process like business partner, Business partner relation, clearing account, counterparty, Loan contract, Collateral Object, Collateral Agreement, Construction deposit, Savings deposit, replicating the clearing account to Ficax and creating SEPA mandate in Ficax system.
Responsible for implementation of 7 process object types in POL.
Development of synchronous and asynchronous custom services using the SIW tool of POL.
Develop Editing UI in POL for error handling or monitoring process.
Provide inputs and guidance to POL consultants to build the process to integrate with SAP.
Understand and Identify the mapping analysis for many complex services in banking services that is consumed by POL.
Prepare Technical Design for Objects developed in POL and ABAP.
Develop SAPUI5 applications using WebIDE,Jquery,Java Script,XML.
Expert in developing NetWeaver Gateway Services.
Expert in integrating Gateway OData/JSON Services with UI5 Apps.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager
